name: PhytomoneLifestyle
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Daily updates from Phytomone, providing lifestyle and skincare insights. Designed to help you feel good inside and out!
What you may not realise is, once your reach your mid-thirties, the biggest cause of skin ageing is loss of oestrogen. Without the protective effects of this vital hormone, skin health rapidly deteriorates. Normal anti-ageing creams cannot rectify this. Now for the first time ever, all this is about to change, as Phytomone introduce ‘Cosmetic HRT’ into their formulations, to directly address skin ageing at the root cause, loss of oestrogen. With two doctors endorsements and impressive scientifically proven results. You can feel secure in the knowledge that the Phytomone Collection will leave you feeling confident, inspired and ready to live life to the fullest, as you flaunt your radiant, youthful complexion. Created by Jane Atherton { SAC I.T.E.C BMS } after 10 years of research into hormonal skin ageing and formulated with the help of world renowned leading cosmetic scientists.
